articles.title: CDC cuts isolation time for Americans who test positive from 10 days to 5. Latest COVID-19 updates - USA TODAY
articles.description: Health officials also reduced the amount of time one should quarantine after coming into contact with someone who tests positive for COVID. Updates.
articles.content: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has cut the amount of time it recommends people should isolate after testing positive for the coronavirus, reducing the number of days from 10 to five. … [+11615 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: American Civil War artefacts recovered after 130-year-old time capsule opened up - 9News
articles.description: Conservation experts in Virginia’s capital on Tuesday pulled books, money, ammunition, documents and other artefacts from a time capsule found in the remnants of a pedestal that once held a statue of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee
